Places to Visit Outside of Recycle City

These websites outside of Recycle City have great information on protecting the environment! You can also find additional education resources at EPA's Environmental Education site.

  • Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Resources for Students and Educators
  • Tips for Reducing Waste
  • Recycling
  • Composting
  • Landfills
  • Zero Waste
  • National Recycling, Composting, and Landfill Data
  • Environmental Justice
  • Land, Waste, and Cleanup Topics
  • Recycling, Waste and Climate Change
  • Climate Change
  • Clean School Buses
  • Electric Vehicles

Buying Green Products

  • Greener Products
  • Safer Choice - products that are safer for human health and the environment
  • Recycled Products – products made out of the stuff you put into the recycling bin
  • ENERGY STAR – products that save energy
  • WaterSense – products that save water
